title: Fund, Make, Distribute
description: Welcome to a podcast that dives into how new ways creative people to fund, manufacture and produce, and distribute digital and physical goods to audiences they previously couldn't reach. The New Disruptors is about profound changes in the economy for making things. Listen to a brief introduction.
itunes:author: Glenn Fleishman
